name: thrust-platform
author: Hayesmaker Media Ltd @hayes_maker

scripts.build:new: npm run build:babel && npm run build:pixi
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require babel-polyfill --compilers js:babel-register src/test/test.js --reporter nyan
scripts.test:report: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --require babel-polyfill --compilers js:babel-register src/test/test.js --reporter tap
scripts.test:list: npm run browserify:test && npm run mocha
scripts.mocha: echo 'Attempting to run mocha bdd style unit tests' && phantomjs ./node_modules/mocha-phantomjs-core/mocha-phantomjs-core.js ./public/javascripts/test/index.html
scripts.build: npm run browserify:canvas && npm run uglify:canvas
scripts.build:heroku: npm run build:fullgame && npm run build:new && npm run browserify:test
scripts.build:fullgame: npm run browserify:canvas:full && npm run uglify:canvas
scripts.debug:android: echo 'Ensure Android device is connected, and has USB debugging enabled' && adb forward tcp:9222 localabstract:chrome_devtools_remote
scripts.browserify:canvas:full: echo 'browserifying canvas build' && browserify --version && browserify -t [ envify --THRUST_ENV fullgame ] -e src/old/main-canvas.js -o public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-canvas.js -d
scripts.browserify:canvas: echo 'browserifying canvas build' && browserify --version && browserify src/old/main-canvas.js -t [ envify --THRUST_ENV demo ] > public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-canvas.js -d
scripts.browserify:mobile: echo 'browserifying mobile build' && browserify --version && browserify -e src/old/main-mobile.js -o public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-mobile.js -d
scripts.browserify:webgl: echo 'browserifying webgl build' && browserify --version && browserify -e src/old/main-webgl.js -o public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-webgl.js -d
scripts.browserify:main: echo 'browserifying auto build' && browserify --version && browserify -e src/old/main-auto.js -o public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-auto.js -d
scripts.browserify:cordova: echo 'browserifying cordova build' && browserify --version && browserify -e src/old/main-cordova.js -o public/javascripts/browserify/thrust-engine-cordova.js -d
scripts.heroku: echo 'Deploying to heroku master' && git push heroku master
scripts.update:audio: echo 'run audiosprite task from dev before running this' && cp -rf ../thrust-platform-dev/_dev/audio/result/ ./public/assets/audiosprite/
scripts.heroku:rebuild: git commit --allow-empty -m 'empty commit' && git push heroku master

description: Thrust: an awesome 8 bit physics based puzzle/blaster.  Thrust-Platform: A Canvas based HTML5 game engine for making games similar to Thrust
